name: AVFragmentedMovieMinder
desc: An object that checks whether a fragmented movie appends additional movie fragments.

items.name: init(movie: AVFragmentedMovie, mindingInterval: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Creates a movie minder and adds a movie with a minding interval.

items.name: func add(AVFragmentedMovie)
items.desc: Adds a fragmented movie to the array of movies being minded.

items.name: func remove(AVFragmentedMovie)
items.desc: Removes a fragmented movie from the array of movies being minded.

items.name: var mindingInterval: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time between checks for additional movie fragments.

items.name: var movies: [AVFragmentedMovie]
items.desc: An array containing the fragmented movie objects being minded.
